DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel , Gemcitabine Bevacizumab Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Docetaxel plus gemcitabine active combination salvage treatment metastatic breast cancer . Administered every two week , combination favorable toxicity profile , promise activity > 1st line treatment metastatic breast cancer . Recently , initial therapy metastatic breast cancer paclitaxel plus bevacizumab demonstrate prolonged progression-free survival , compare paclitaxel alone . This study evaluate addition bevacizumab biweekly regimen docetaxel gemcitabine salvage therapy metastatic breast cancer .
